TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ArrayPool`1<T> extends System.Object
generic <typename T> public ref class ArrayPool abstract

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 资源池中的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the objects that are in the resource pool.

summary.span: 提供可重复使用 T[] 类型实例的资源池。

span.span: Provides a resource pool that enables reusing instances of type T[].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类租用并返回缓冲区 (使用 和 方法) 可以在频繁创建和销毁数组的情况下提高性能，从而导致垃圾回收器出现大量的内存压力。Using the class to rent and return buffers (using the and methods) can improve performance in situations where arrays are created and destroyed frequently, resulting in significant memory pressure on the garbage collector.

span.span: This class is thread-safe.

threadsafe.span: 所有成员可以同时由多个线程使用。

span.span: All members may be used by multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此构造函数是受保护的;它只能由派生自类的类调用 。Note that this constructor is protected; it can only be called by classes derived from the class.

param.name: maxArrayLength
param.span: 可能存储在池中的数组实例的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of an array instance that may be stored in the pool.

param.name: maxArraysPerBucket
param.span: 可能存储在池中每个存储桶的数组实例的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum number of array instances that may be stored in each bucket in the pool.

param.span: 该池将长度类似的数组分到不同的存储桶，以更快进行访问。

span.span: The pool groups arrays of similar lengths into buckets for faster access.

summary.span: 使用指定的配置创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class using the specified configuration.

returns.span: 使用指定配置的 类的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the class with the specified configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的类的实例将数组分组到存储桶中，而不是 `maxArraysPerBucket` 在每个存储桶中，并且这些数组的 `maxArrayLength` 长度不超过。The instance of the class created by this method will group arrays into buckets, with no more than `maxArraysPerBucket` in each bucket, and with those arrays not exceeding `maxArrayLength` in length.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract T[] Rent (int minimumLength);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !T[] Rent(int32 minimumLength) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Rent (minimumLength As Integer) As T()
public: abstract cli::array <T> ^ Rent(int minimumLength);
abstract member Rent : int -> 'T[]

span.span: The minimum length of the array.

summary.span: 检索至少为请求的长度的缓冲区。

span.span: Retrieves a buffer that is at least the requested length.

returns.span: T 类型的数组，该数组长度至少为 。

span.span: An array of type T that is at least in length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此缓冲区借给调用方，并且应使用方法返回到相同的池 ，以便可以在对方法的后续调用中重用 。This buffer is loaned to the caller and should be returned to the same pool using the method, so that it can be reused in subsequent calls to the method. 未能返回租赁缓冲区不是致命错误。Failure to return a rented buffer is not a fatal error. 但是，这可能会导致应用程序性能下降，因为池可能需要创建新的缓冲区来替换丢失的缓冲区。However, it may lead to decreased application performance, as the pool may need to create a new buffer to replace the lost one. 此方法返回的数组不能初始化为零。The array returned by this method may not be zero-initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Return (T[] array, bool clearArray = false);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Return(!T[] array, bool clearArray) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Return (array As T(), Optional clearArray As Boolean = false)
abstract member Return : 'T[] * bool -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要返回给先前使用 方法获得的池的缓冲区。

span.span: A buffer to return to the pool that was previously obtained using the method.

param.name: clearArray
param.span: 指示是否应在重复使用前清除缓冲区的内容。

span.span: Indicates whether the contents of the buffer should be cleared before reuse.

param.span: 如果 设置为 ，并且该池将存储缓冲区，供后续重复使用， 方法将清除其内容的 ，这样，使用 方法的后续调用方便不会看到先前调用方的内容。

span.span: If is set to , and if the pool will store the buffer to enable subsequent reuse, the method will clear the of its contents so that a subsequent caller using the method will not see the content of the previous caller.

param.span: 如果 设置为 ，或者该池将释放缓冲区，则数组内容保持不变。

span.span: If is set to or if the pool will release the buffer, the array's contents are left unchanged.

summary.span: 要返回给先前在同一 实例上使用 方法获得的池的缓冲区。

span.span: Returns an array to the pool that was previously obtained using the method on the same instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将缓冲区返回到池中后，调用方将获得缓冲区的所有所有权，并且不能使用它。Once a buffer has been returned to the pool, the caller gives up all ownership of the buffer and must not use it. 从对方法的给定调用返回的引用 必须仅使用 方法返回一次。The reference returned from a given call to the method must only be returned using the method once. 默认情况下 ，可能会保留在返回的缓冲区以对其进行租用，或者，如果确定池已存储了足够的缓冲区，则可能会释放返回的缓冲区。The default may hold onto the returned buffer in order to rent it again, or it may release the returned buffer if it's determined that the pool already has enough buffers stored.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Buffers.ArrayPool<T> Shared { get; }
.property class System.Buffers.ArrayPool`1<!T> Shared
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Shared As ArrayPool(Of T)
public: static property System::Buffers::ArrayPool<T> ^ Shared { System::Buffers::ArrayPool<T> ^ get(); };
member this.Shared : System.Buffers.ArrayPool<'T>

span.span: Gets a shared instance.
A shared instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享池提供 类的默认实现，该实现适用于一般的适用性。The shared pool provides a default implementation of the class that's intended for general applicability. 共享类维护多个大小的数组，并且可能会退回比实际请求更大的数组，但它永远不会退回比请求的更小的数组。A shared class maintains arrays of multiple sizes, and may hand back a larger array than was actually requested, but it will never hand back a smaller array than was requested. 通过使用方法来租用共享类中的缓冲区 ，将导致从池中获取现有缓冲区（如果有合适的缓冲区可用），或者如果没有可用的新缓冲区，则会分配新的缓冲区。Renting a buffer from a shared class using the method will result in an existing buffer being taken from the pool if an appropriate buffer is available or in a new buffer being allocated if one is not available.
